Text:
The race is already heating up in the Great
Ize-athlon 2.0! Those in the lead are approaching
the next trial!

This is the second challenge... What kind of ordeal
awaits, and how will it be tackled... There's a lot
to look forward to.
What's next? A fistfight or something?

Our commentators are also curious about the next
event... It's called "Card Shoot"!

"Card Shoot"... I wonder what that could mean?
You throw a card to flip over other cards?

Exactly! Here, you'll need to flip over five cards
to advance.
It suddenly got so lame.
Y-You don't mince words, do you...

It's tame for the Great Ize-athlon, but it requires
flipping technique and throwing form... It'll be
interesting to see how each participant performs
individually.

Right! Exactly! Alpha, you're great at hyping things
up!
U-Uh... Thank you...

(Just flip over five cards, huh... Is that really
all there is to it?)
I see... So it's a challenge where control is key.
Heheh. This event seems tailor-made for me!

...Zeta, aren't you joining in? You haven't moved
all this time...

Don't mind me. This is like fishingâ€”it's all about
the right timing.

I don't quite get it, but that's just fine by me!
Take this! Hyahhh!
Whoa! Epsilon's card flies with incredible control!

She's flipping the cards one after another!
Whoa, what a pace!

That's Epsilon for you. She doesn't rely on
strength, but on perfect form and precision.
Impressive technique.
*yawn* I'm getting sleepy.

Um, Delta? Could you show a little more enthusiasm,
please?
I'll use this momentum...and flip the fifth one!
...Huh, what? "Start over"...?!

Epsilon flipped the wrong card! She must place all
her cards back and start from scratch!
This is so unfair...!

Having to flip five cards in a row, and the right
ones, too... Everyone seems to be struggling.

Tsk... I have to start over! Just when I managed to
flip one!
Damn it... Where are the right cards?!

Cries of frustration ring out from the participants!
What will happen in "Card Shoot"? Who will emerge
triumphant?!

Ugh...I can't advance like this. Take this card and
go first!
But, this is the one you risked everything to flipâ€”
Just do what I tell you! ...Do it for me too.
Jeez, maaaaan!
What are they even doing...?

Ugh... You got to be kidding. But I remember where
I put back the card I just took. If I aim for that oneâ€”
Oh, I'll take that, thank you.
Ah?! Hey!

Zeta manages to swipe it from under Epsilon's nose!
Epsilon's target card has been taken!

Never let your guard down. Thanks for handing it
over.
W-Wait, is that why you weren't moving earlier...?

Observation is my forte. I'm not breaking any rules,
so don't take it personally.
Got my five cards, so I'll catch you later.
Ugh...! Oh no you don't!

(...No, I can't let my emotions get the better of
me. I'll calmly determine which card to flip...!)

Oh? Epsilon appears to be frozen. Was she that
traumatized by having her card taken by Zeta?
...Her aura seems different.
Yes, she's...incredibly focused.

(The effects of the "start over" cards shouldn't
last long, so there must be a subtle difference
in the amount of magic residue between them
and the correct cards...)

(I'll use my magic detection to discern the
difference...!)

...Got it! The right cards are...this, this, this,
this and...this!

Incredible! Epsilon flawlessly flipped all five of
the right cards!

It may seem like luck to the casual onlooker,
but it's not. It's her skill that pulled that off.
Card shooting looks fun! I wanna play too!

The entire venue erupts in response to Epsilon's
miraculous performance! No one can take their
eyes off of whatever's coming next!

Just you wait, Zeta... I'll catch up to you soon
enough!
